attributes.action: Make monday 12th july a official bank holiday
attributes.additional_details: Because we are in the final and we should celebrate without worry about losing our jobs
attributes.background: Make monday 12th july a official holiday for this year only

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Bank Holiday Monday if England get to the finals of the Euro’s 2020
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590584
